content: Hubby is in Iraq right now, and I just posted a message on Stars and Stripes. It says right there that the message will be published in the paper! So, anyway, just in case anyone else is insterested: I am going to see if I can plug the link: [""""url=http://messages.stripes.osd.mil/2009/fathersday/home]http://messages.stripes.osd.mil/2009/fathersday/home[/url] Hot links are not allowed on Military.com. I fixed for you so you can still use the link but remove the """" Mainedawg Moderator This message has been edited. Last edited by: mainedawg, Wed 20 May 2009 10:28 AM
